page.title: 04ST.PATRICK'S CHURCH
page.content: In 1899 the whole of St.Patrick's Church ,with the exception of the tower was rebuilt. The chancel is raised eight steps above the nave in order to accommodate the vestry below.The inside of the church has been made very beautiful with the organ and the lovely carved gallery and the beautiful stained glass windows.We use the church for special days like harvest,Easter,Christmas,weddings and funerals and christenings.In the 1980's more people are coming to the church.The hymns that we sing are less dreary than they were.Mr.Degg came to the church 7 years ago. He has been a vicar for about 21 years. The work of a vicar's wife is very important when the vicar is out, his wife answers the phone.
